name: Personal Space (Hannah)
description:
You just got home from a long day at work, and all you want is to be by yourself...but your friends have other ideas. 

Use WASD or the arrow keys to select one of your four available moves to stay away from all the other party-goers who keep pouring in your door and keep your stress level from rising. If you keep your cool until midnight, the party will end and you can collapse on the couch with all that leftover cake!

Made for LDJam 42, "Running Out of Space."
